product_name: Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Long Underwear Zip-T - Men's
long_description: The warmest, breathable base layer in the Patagonia Capilene line, Capilene 4 Expedition Weight long underwear Zip-T keeps you dry and comfortable in cold weather and vents heat with a zipper. Capilene 4 Expedition Weight long underwear Zip-T has a soft, stretchy feel, with a smooth face that glides beneath layers. Open-grid brushed fleece interior warms your core, wicks moisture and is smooth against your skin. Polygiene(R) permanent odor control resists odors so you can breathe easy after a long day of activity. Deep front zipper lets you ventilate when you overheat. Details include articulated, offset-seamed sleeves for complete shoulder mobility and hidden thumb loops to ensure wrist coverage. Designed to be long enough to tuck into pants, the droptail hem stays put under a harness.
